DOC.brief_title: Supportive Care Patients Newly Diagnosed With Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients meet entry criterion randomize intervention arm , palliative care plus usual care usual care arm . Patients randomize intervention arm receive usual oncologic care phone call nurse . Outcomes measure collect baseline , 3 month . The study perform VA Puget Sound Health Care System . The investigator recruit individual ( n=40 ) lung cancer 1 year . The primary objective test feasibility acceptability intervention , recruitment subject . The investigator estimate effect nurse-led telephone base palliative care intervention improve quality-of-life , symptom burden patient satisfaction . In addition , use validated instrument , investigator assess potential effect size intervention quality provider communication clinician knowledge patient preference life sustain therapy . The result pilot study inform future randomize clinical trial test efficacy intervention large scale .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose Puget Sound Health Care System primary diagnosis lung cancer , cell type stage , diagnose within 8 week study enrollment . Must telephone access , ability understand English provide inform consent . Patients eligible participate study include inpatient prior randomization , care palliative care hospice time randomization , severe mental health disorder , unable speak directly nurse telephone , inability provide inform consent . Investigators recruit individual ( n=40 ) lung cancer 12 month period .
